Articles.Content:
So uh, hi everyone. I started this one with an intention of making simple vehicle to roam some kerbals around KSC during test launches etc. And then happened what I now call the "KSP Effect".

It smoothly run kerbin surface at 40-50m/s. Can turn quite well at this speeds, with almost no risk of being screwed.

A few action groups are:

1 - turn TurboJet engine on/off.

2 - rear wheels steering lock\unlock (locking increases stability while turning drastically).

B - breaks =) - but only with the rear wheels, so it can break stable too.

G - yeah, gears, raise or lower them if you want, but leaving them lowered makes all the difference in turn stability.

Gears also happen to ensure some safety on wheel damage.

Have fun.
